TopicTitle: Bloody stowed stopping me from doing cool stuff

Articles.Content:
I'm attempting to drive a car out of a plain but when I go to the parachutes and/or jump-jets it says can't use ... when stowed.

I don't know my way around this thing so I came here for help so help me

Edited October 21, 2015 by MadMan43

it has happened again I was taking of a jet out of the back of the plane then the engines wouldn't activate because they were stowed.

id put a screen shot in here but I don't know how to use url
